citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am on
04-May-17.
Inspector spoke with licensee who stated she was not available and would not be returning until late
afternoon/evening.
